content: Configure Trusted Mail Domain Settings to specify the allowed mail servers to use for self-registration.

comment.text: Configure Trusted Mail Domain Settings to specify allowed mail servers for self-registration. This setting is used to describe a security category in a portal settings page and appears as part of the "Trusted Mail" section, likely on a button or link labeled "Save To Apply".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'self-registration' is translated as 'التسجيل الشخصي للمستخدم'. While technically correct, 'التسجيل الذاتي' would be a more concise and commonly used translation in this context.  'الشخصي للمستخدم' adds unnecessary verbosity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: تهيئة إعدادات نطاق البريد الموثوق لتحديد خوادم البريد المسموحة للتسجيل الذاتي.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Özünü qeydiyyat üçün istifadə edilməsinə icazə verilən" is overly verbose and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'to use for self-registration'. A more direct translation would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Öz-qeydiyyat üçün istifadə oluna bilən

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is slightly awkward and could be improved for readability in Azerbaijani. Consider reordering the phrases.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Etibarlı Poçt Domen Parametrlərini konfiqurasiya edərək, öz-qeydiyyat üçün istifadə oluna bilən poçt serverlərini təyin edin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Настройките за Доверен Мейл Домейн' is a bit lengthy and could be made more concise. While technically correct, it's stylistically less elegant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing as 'Настройки за доверени имейл домейни' (Settings for trusted email domains) for better readability.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'електронна поща' (elektronna poshta) is correct for 'email', it's quite formal.  'Имейл' is a more common and natural term in modern Bulgarian usage.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'електронна поща' with 'имейл'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon after 'Settings' is missing in the Greek translation.  It should read 'Ρυθμίσεις: αξιόπιστου τομέα...'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Διαμορφώστε τις Ρυθμίσεις: αξιόπιστου τομέα αλληλογραφίας για να καθορίσετε...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'autorregistro' while technically meaning self-registration, is not commonly used in Spanish and can sound awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'registro automático' or 'registro por cuenta propia'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configure los ajustes de dominio de correo de confianza para especificar los servidores de correo permitidos que se utilizarán para el registro automático.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the phrase 'que se utilizarán' is a bit wordy.  It can be more concise.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configure los ajustes de dominio de correo de confianza para especificar los servidores de correo permitidos para el registro automático.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Määritä Luotetun sähköpostin toimialueen asetukset määrittääksesi sallitut sähköpostipalvelimet, joita käytetään itse-rekisteröintiin' is a bit verbose and formal for this context. 'Luotetun sähköpostin toimialueen asetukset' is a bit clunky.  A more natural phrasing would be more concise.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Määritä sallitut sähköpostipalvelimet itse-rekisteröintiä varten.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'joita käytetään itse-rekisteröintiin' is grammatically correct, but feels unnecessarily complex for this context. A more accessible phrasing could improve clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: itse rekisteröitymiseen

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "à utiliser pour l'auto-enregistrement" is a literal translation and sounds awkward in French. A more natural phrasing would be "pour l'inscription automatique" or "pour l'enregistrement automatique".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configurez les paramètres du domaine de messagerie de confiance pour spécifier les serveurs de messagerie autorisés pour l'inscription automatique.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Վստահելի փոստի Դոմենի կարգավորումները" is a literal translation of "Trusted Mail Domain Settings" but sounds overly formal and somewhat clunky in Armenian. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more fluent translation such as "Վստահելի փոստային դոմեների կարգավորումներ" (Trusted mail domains settings) or "Վստահելի էլեկտրոնային փոստի դոմեների կարգավորումներ" (Trusted email domain settings).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "որպեսզի նշեք փոստի թույլատրելի սերվերները" (in order to specify the allowed mail servers) could be simplified for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to "որպեսզի ցուցեք թույլատրված փոստի սերվերները" (in order to indicate the permitted mail servers) or "որպեսզի սահմանեք թույլատրված փոստի սերվերները" (in order to define the permitted mail servers).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "ինքնագրանցման համար" (for self-registration) is correct but could be adjusted for a more colloquial feel.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider  "ինքնուրույն գրանցման համար" (for independent registration) or "ինքնակազմավարման համար" (for self-managed registration) as potential alternatives. However, the original is not incorrect.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ອະນຸຍາດ' can be improved for clarity in this context. It literally means 'allowed' but in this context, 'ຮັບອະນຸຍາດ' (permitted) or 'ຮັບຮອງ' (approved/recognized) might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຕັ້ງຄ່າການຕັ້ງຄ່າໂດເມນເມລທີ່ເຊື່ອຖືໄດ້ເພື່ອລະບຸເຄື່ອງແມ່ຂ່າຍເມລທີ່ຮັບຮອງໃຫ້ໃຊ້ສໍາລັບການລົງທະບຽນດ້ວຍຕົນເອງ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "autorregistro" is not the most natural or widely understood translation for "self-registration" in Portuguese. While technically correct, it sounds somewhat formal and might not be easily grasped by all users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Registro próprio or Auto-registro would be better options, depending on the target audience and overall tone of the application.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not a major issue, the translation could benefit from a slightly smoother flow. It sounds a bit clunky due to the direct translation of 'Configure'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ajuste as configurações de domínio de correio confiável para especificar os servidores de correio permitidos para registro próprio.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'autorregistro' while technically correct, isn't the most common or natural way to express 'self-registration' in Brazilian Portuguese. It can sound a bit formal or technical for a user-facing setting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configure as configurações de domínio de e-mail confiável para especificar os servidores de e-mail permitidos para registro próprio.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a somewhat formal tone. Consider softening the wording to improve user experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configure as configurações de domínio de e-mail confiável para especificar os servidores de e-mail permitidos para o registro de novos usuários.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "severe de e-mail" is incorrect. It should be "servere de e-mail".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configurați setările domeniului de e-mail de încredere pentru a indica serverele de e-mail pe care le utilizați pentru autoînregistrarea utilizatorilor.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "autoînregistrarea utilizatorilor" is a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would be more direct.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configurați setările domeniului de e-mail de încredere pentru a indica serverele de e-mail pe care le utilizați pentru înregistrare.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'වසම්' is a slightly unusual and potentially ambiguous choice. While it can mean 'domains,' in this context, a more common and clearer term might be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: වසම් වෙනුවට 'බෙල්ඔරිඩම්' (beloridam) හෝ 'අඩෝමීන්' (adomin) වැනි වචන භාවිතා කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit convoluted. It could be made more fluent and natural for Sinhala readers.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ස්වයං ලියාපදිංචිය සඳහා භාවිතා කිරීමට හැකි විශ්වසනීය තැපැල් සේවාදායකයන් (mail servers) සකසන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English 'Configure' is translated as 'වින්‍යාස කරන්න' which focuses on the action of configuring rather than the resulting setting. A better representation of 'settings' is needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 'වින්‍යාස කරන්න' වෙනුවට 'සකසන්න' (sakasanawa - to set/arrange) භාවිතා කරන්න, වඩාත් සුදුසු වේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation 'Nakonfigurujte nastavenia dôveryhodnej poštovej domény a zadajte povolené poštové servery, ktoré sa môžu použiť na samo registráciu' is not an accurate translation of 'Configure Trusted Mail Domain Settings to specify the allowed mail servers to use for self-registration.'. The phrase 'ktoré sa môžu použiť' is clunky and doesn't convey the meaning accurately. It implies the servers *can* be used, not that they *are* used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nakonfigurujte nastavenia dôveryhodných poštových domén a určite povolené poštové servery pre samo registráciu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'samo registráciu' is grammatically correct, 'samoregistráciu' is more commonly used and would be a more natural-sounding word.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: samoregistráciu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'поузданих поштанских домена' (trusted mail domains) is technically correct, but in a user interface context, a simpler phrasing like 'поузданих домена е-поште' (trusted email domains) might be more understandable to a broader audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Конфигуришите подешавања поузданих домена е-поште да одредите дозвољене сервере поште за саморегистрацију.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the sentence structure is a bit long and complex. Breaking it into two sentences might improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Конфигуришите подешавања поузданих поштанских домена. Ово ће одредити дозвољене сервере поште за саморегистрацију.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'poštanskih' is a genitive plural and might not be the best fit. 'Poštanskih domena' (of mail domains) is technically correct, but sounds a bit awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfigurišite podešavanja pouzdanih mejlovskih domena da odredite dozvoljene servere pošte za samoregistraciju.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'odredite' is a valid translation for 'specify', it might be slightly formal for this context. A more natural wording could be considered.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfigurišite podešavanja pouzdanih mejlovskih domena da navedete dozvoljene servere pošte za samoregistraciju.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Güvenilen Posta Alanı Ayarlarını yapılandırın" is a bit literal and could be more natural. 'Configure' often translates to 'ayarla' or 'belirle' depending on context.  'Yapılandırın' implies a more complex configuration than might be necessary.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kendi kendine kayıt için kullanılabilecek posta sunucularını belirlemek üzere Güvenilir E-posta Alanı ayarlarını yapın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of '...' in the English content isn't directly translated into the Turkish. While not strictly incorrect, it might be better to mirror the structure to maintain consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kendi kendine kayıt için kullanılmak üzere izin verilen posta sunucularını belirlemek üzere Güvenilir Posta Alanı Ayarlarını yapılandırın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a comma after 'доменів' which, while not strictly incorrect, is less common and stylistically weaker than a period in this context.  A period would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Налаштуйте параметри довірених поштових доменів. Щоб вказати поштові сервери, які дозволено використовувати для самостійної реєстрації.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Trusted Mail Domain" as "Tên miền Thư Tin cậy" is technically correct but could be improved for clarity and natural flow in Vietnamese. 'Thư Tin cậy' sounds a bit stiff. A more natural phrasing might be 'Miền thư đáng tin cậy' or 'Miền thư tin cậy'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Miền thư đáng tin cậy' or 'Miền thư tin cậy'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'để tự đăng ký' (to self-register) is grammatically correct but could be more precise. It’s not clear if it means *by* the user or the system using the mail servers for registration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to clarify who is registering. For example, 'để tự động đăng ký' (for automatic registration).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "通过“配置受信任的邮件域设置”" is a bit awkward. It literally translates to "Through 'Configure Trusted Mail Domain Settings'" which is not the most natural phrasing in Chinese. It's better to rephrase the introduction of the setting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 使用“配置受信任的邮件域设置”来指定允许用于自注册的邮件服务器。
